output: 
  html_document: 
    keep_md: yes

```{r}
library(foreach)
library(formattable)
```

# This does not Work.

```{r}
withVisible(
for (i in 1:5)
{
  print(i)
  formattable(pressure, align ="l")
  cat('\n')
  plot(pressure)
  cat('\n')
})
```

# This does not Work, too.

```{r}
foreach(i = 1:5) %do%
{
  print(i)
  formattable(pressure, align ="l")
  cat('\n')
  plot(pressure)
  cat('\n')
}
```
